surname Qin; Qin dynasty (221-207 BC) of the first emperor 秦始皇

rtega_mnemonic:
秦秦RS𣜈𥘿𥠼𥢮𥣠Manchu dynasty, name given to naturalized foreigners
  • RS. hands on top 𡗗 with a pestal 午 barking grain 禾: → 秦
purpleculture_examples:
先秦 [ xiān qín ]: pre-Qin, Chinese history up to the foundation of the Qin imperial dynasty in 221 BC
秦腔 [ qín qiāng ]: Qinqiang, an opera style popular in northwest China, possibly originating in Ming dynasty folk music; Shaanxi opera
后秦 [ hòu qín ]: Later Qin of the Sixteen Kingdoms (384-417)
前秦 [ qián qín ]: Former Qin of the Sixteen Kingdoms (351-395)
朝秦暮楚 [ zhāo qín mù chǔ ]: serve Qin in the morning Chu in the evening (idiom); quick to switch sides
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 禾 [ hé ] cereal, grain, rice; plant, stalk
heisig_chinese_memo: The Qin dynasty focused on growing bonsai instead of wheat.
Ru_Meaning: Manchu dynasty, name given to naturalized foreigners
Ru_Notes:
Других слов и значений действительно не найти.
Не путать: 秦 (はた、シン) означает династию Цинь, это не то же, что династия Цзинь 晋 (すす．む、シン продвигаться). Мало того, династий Цзинь в истории Китая было несколько.
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), 二 (два), 人 (человек), 禾 (ость колоса)

humanum_full_description_en:
A bronze inscription from " Afternoon " ( " pestle beginning of the text" of) the " European allies " (like hands) from the second " bluegrass " or triple " Wo ", Jin, bamboo or add from " mortar " made from " Chung " from " bluegrass " the shape will undoubtedly intended to hold hands pestle threshing of grain, threshing is an important part of the harvest (Wang Wenyao, new Bing), the original meaning Chung pound cereal.

Bronze or only from a " bluegrass " or eliminating the need for hands shaped like a " European allies ." One said that " Qin " was the name of the crop. Xu Shen believed that the land of Qin was suitable for growing crops, so he named the crop the name of the country. "Said Wen": "Qin, after Bo Yi, the country was sealed, the land is suitable for He. Conghe, the province. One said: Qin, He name. 𥠼, Qin Wen Qin Congsi."

Oracle is borrowed as place names and personal names. Also suspected to be used as a sacrifice name.

Bronze script is used as the name of the country, 𠫑Qiang bell: "Zheng Qin", referring to the Qin country. Qin Wangzhong's "Qin King" and Qin Gongzhong's "Qin Gong" are both kings of the State of Qin. Qin Gonggui: "Protecting the industry (Dian) 氒 <and ─ have> Qin", which means blessing and assisting Qin. Also used as a name, Huan Qin Gui: "Huan Qin Zha (made) and (ancestor) Yibao (簋)".

The bamboo slips of the Warring States Period were used as the name of the country. Jane 39: "The Qin and Jin Dynasties will be good, and Mu (Liu) will have one heart." It is also pronounced " Qin ", Zheng Guohe's name, "Shangbo Bamboo Book One. Confucius Poems" Jian 29: ""She Qin (Qin)" does not (its) superbly cares for scholars", which means "She Qin" (ie "Poetry. Zheng Feng. The clothes") a poem tells that scholars are absolutely unreasonable Appease and do what a scholar should do.

humanum_full_description:
甲金文從「午」(「杵」的初文)從「廾」(象雙手)從二「禾」或三「禾」，金文、竹簡或加從「臼」，作從「舂」從「禾」之形，疑會雙手持杵搗禾脫穀之意，脫粒是收穫的重要環節(王文耀、陳秉新)，本義是舂搗禾穀。

　　金文或只從一「禾」，或省去象雙手形的「廾」。一說「秦」是禾名，許慎認為秦國的土地適宜種植禾，故取禾名為國名。《說文》：「秦，伯益之後所封國，地宜禾。从禾，舂省。一曰：秦，禾名。𥠼，籒文秦从秝。」

　　甲骨文借用為地名、人名。又疑用為祭名。

　　金文用作國名，𠫑羌鐘：「征秦」，指征討秦國。秦王鐘的「秦王」、秦公鐘的「秦公」都是秦國國君。秦公簋：「保業(䢃)氒〈又─有〉秦」，表示保佑輔助秦國。又用作人名，洹秦簋：「洹秦乍(作)且(祖)乙寶𣪕(簋)」。

　　戰國竹簡用作國名，《清華簡二．繫年》簡39：「秦晉焉始會好，穆(勠)力同心。」又讀為「溱」，鄭國河流名，《上博竹書一．孔子詩論》簡29：「〈涉秦(溱)〉丌(其)絕撫而士」，表示〈涉溱〉(即《詩．鄭風．褰裳》)一詩講述士人斷絕不合義理的安撫，而做士人應做的事。
humanum_short_description: 甲金文從「午」(「杵」的初文)從「廾」(象雙手)從二「禾」或三「禾」，金文、竹簡或加從「臼」，作從「舂」從「禾」之形，疑會雙手持杵搗禾脫穀之意，脫粒是收穫的重要環節(王文耀、陳秉新)，本義是舂搗禾穀。

秦字的基本解释

秦
qín
中国周代诸侯国名，在今陕西省和甘肃省一带：朝（zh乷 ）秦暮楚。秦晋之好。秦楼楚馆（旧时指妓院）。
中国朝代名：秦代。秦镜高悬（喻法官判案的公正严明。亦称“明镜高悬”）。
中国陕西省的别称。
Ch'in

秦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qín］
［《廣韻》匠鄰切，平真，從。］
(1)古部落名。嬴姓。相传是伯益的后代。非子做部落首领时，居于犬丘（今陕西兴平东南），善养马，被周孝王封于秦（今甘肃张家川东），作为附庸。
(2)周朝国名。嬴姓，周孝王封伯翳之后非子为附庸，与以秦邑。秦襄公始立国，至秦孝公，日益富强，为战国七雄之一。春秋时奄有今陕西省地，故习称陕西为秦。
(3)朝代名。我国历史上第一个专制主义中央集权的封建王朝。公元前221年秦王政统一中原，自称始皇帝，建都咸阳。前206年，为汉所灭。传二世，共十五年。
(4)东晋十六国时期国名。（1）公元352年氐族贵族苻健称帝，国号秦，建都长安，史称前秦。（2）公元386年，羌族贵族姚萇称帝，亦国号秦，建都长安，史称後秦。（3）公元385年鲜卑贵族乞伏国仁称大单于，其弟乾归称河南王，又改称秦王，都苑川（今甘肃榆中北），史称西秦。
(5)古邑名。即秦城、秦亭。在今甘肃张家川东。秦祖先非子封于此，是秦的最早都邑。
(6)汉时西域诸国对中国的称呼。
(7)香草名。一说为木名。
(8)陕西省的简称。春秋时，秦国土奄有今陕

秦字的英文翻译

◎ 秦
Ch'in

秦字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【禾字部】　秦； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页851第30
〔古文〕?【唐韻】【廣韻】匠隣切【集韻】【類篇】【韻會】【正韻】慈隣切，?音螓。國名。【說文】伯益之後所封國。地宜禾。【詩·秦風·車鄰註】秦，隴西谷名。在雍州鳥鼠山之東北。【疏】今秦亭，秦谷也。【韻會】春秋秦國，漢置天水郡，後魏改秦州。【釋名】秦，津也。其地沃衍有津潤也。　又三秦。【史記·項羽紀】三分關中，王秦降將，章邯雍王，司馬欣塞王，董翳翟王，爲三秦。　又大秦國。【後漢·西域傳】大秦在海西，亦云海西國。其人民長大平正，有類中國，故謂之大秦。　又姓。秦自顓頊後，子嬰旣滅，支庶以爲秦氏。　又【說文】一曰秦，禾名。　又叶慈良切，音牆。【易林】玉璧琮璋，執贄是王。百里寧越，應聘齊秦。

秦字的源字形

秦字的起名意思

：本义指禾名，假借为专名用字；

Qin
Basic explanation of words
Qin
qín
The names of the princes of China in the Zhou Dynasty, in the area of Shaanxi Province and Gansu Province today: Chao (zh 乷) Qin Muchu. Qin Jin's good. Qin Lou Chu Hall (in the past refers to the brothel).
Chinese dynasty name: Qin Dynasty. Qin Jing Gaoxuan (Judge Yu judged the case fairly and rigorously. Also known as "Ding Jing Gaoxuan").
Another name for Shaanxi Province, China.
Ch'in
Qin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qín］
["Guangyun" The craftsman cuts next to each other, plain, from. ]
(1) Ancient tribe name. Ying surname. According to legend, it is the offspring of Boyi. When Feizi was the leader of the tribe, he lived in Dog Hill (now southeast of Xingping, Shaanxi) and was good at raising horses. He was appointed by King Zhou Xiao to Qin (east of Zhangjiachuan, Gansu) as a vassal.
(2) The name of the Zhou Dynasty. With the surname Ying, after King Zhou Xiao named Boyi, Feizi was a vassal, and Qin Yi was the same. Qin Xianggong first established the country, and to Qin Xiaogong, he became increasingly prosperous and became one of the seven heroes of the Warring States Period. In the Spring and Autumn Period, Shaanxi Province was present, so Xi called Shaanxi the Qin Dynasty.
(3) Dynasty name. The first authoritarian centralized feudal dynasty in the history of our country. In 221 BC, the King of Qin unified the Central Plains, proclaimed himself the first emperor, and established the capital of Xianyang. It was destroyed by Han in 206 BC. Passed to the second generation, a total of fifteen years.
(4) The name of the country during the Eastern Jin Dynasty Sixteen Kingdoms period. (1) In 352 AD, Fu Jian, a nobleman of the Di family, became emperor, named Qin in the country, established the capital of Chang'an, and was called the pre-Qin in history. (2) In 386 AD, Yao Chang, a nobleman of the Qiang nationality, was named emperor, also known as Qin, established as the capital of Chang'an, and was called the Later Qin in history. (3) In 385 AD, the Xianbei aristocrats begged the country to be called Dadanyu, and their brothers belonged to the king of Henan, which was also renamed the King of Qin, Duyuanchuan (now north of Yuzhong, Gansu), and was called Western Qin in history.
(5) The name of the ancient town. Namely Qincheng and Qinting. In today's east of Zhangjiachuan, Gansu. The ancestor of Qin Feizi was sealed here, and it was the earliest capital of Qin.
(6) The names of China in the Western Regions during the Han Dynasty.
(7) Vanilla name. One is the wooden name.
(8) The abbreviation of Shaanxi Province. In the Spring and Autumn Period, the land of Qin is dying of Shan
Qin

◎ Qin

Country names. 【Said the text】The country was sealed after Boyi. Land Yihe. 【Poetry·Qin Feng·Che Lin Note】Qin, the name of Longxi Valley. In the northeast of Niaoshu Mountain in Yongzhou. [Sparse] Qin Pavilion today, Qin Gu also. [Rhyme Club] In the Spring and Autumn Period, the State of Qin, the Han Dynasty set Tianshui County, and later the Wei Dynasty changed to Qinzhou. [Release name] Qin, Jin Ye. Its land is fertile and there is also Jinrun.　Three Qin again. [Historical Records·Xiang Yuji] Three points of Guanzhong, Wang Qin descended from generals, Zhang Hanyong, Sima Xinsai, Dong Yi and Zhai, for the Three Qin.　Great Qin country again. [Later Han · Western Regions Biography] Da Qin was in the West of the Strait, and it was also in the West of the Sea. Its people grew up and were upright, like China, so it is called the Great Qin Dynasty.　Another last name. After Qin Zhuanxu, Ziying died, and Zhishu thought of the Qin clan.　[Said Wen] One said Qin, He name.　 Ye Ciliang cut again, the sound wall. [Yi Lin] Yubi Congzhang, Zhizhi is the king. Baili Ningyue, apply for Qi Qin.
Qin
Source glyph
Qin
Name meaning
: The original meaning refers to the name of the farm, and it is used as a proper name under the guise;
秦
qín
秦
秦
会意字。“秦”本来是地名和古代诸侯国名,在今陕西中部一
带。由于这个地方产谷,所以用两
只手举着杵来春“禾”表示。“夫”
是“春”字的省写。
然
Цинь
Цинь
Цинь
Зная слово.
«Цинь» изначально было названием места и именем древних князей в той же местности.
Поскольку это место производит зерно, это означает «он», держащий пест в двух руках.
«Фу» - это провинциальное написание слова «чун».
Конечно
qín
собств.
1) ист. Цинь (название княжества и царства, с дин. Чжоу)
2) ист. Цинь (династия 246―207 гг. до н. э.); циньская эпоха (с III в. до н.э.); циньский; 西秦 ист. Западная Цинь (династия 388―431 гг. н. э.)
秦汉 эпоха династий Цинь―Хань (III в. до н. э.―IIIв. н. э.)
3) геогр. Цинь (сокр. наименование пров. Шэньси, прежде также Ганьсу)
4) Цинь (транскр. Chine, China, название Китая в странах Запада)
5) Цинь (фамилия)

Не путать: 秦 (はた、シン) означает династию Цинь, это не то же, что династия Цзинь 晋 (すす．む、シン продвигаться). Мало того, династий Цзинь в истории Китая было несколько.
